TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: p l iː z k ɔː l s t iː l ɐ æ s k h ɜː t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð iː z f ɪ ŋ z w ɪ v h ɚ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɔːɹ s ɪ k s s p uː n z ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p i z f aɪ v θ ɪ k s l æ v z ʌ v b l uː tʃ i z æ n d m eɪ v i ɐ s m æ ɡ ʌ v h ɚ b ɹ ʌ ð ɚ b w iː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː l p l æ s t ɪ k s n eɪ k æ n ɐ b ɪ ɡ t aɪ f ɹ ɑː ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k ɪ d z ʃ iː k æ n k ɑː b ð iː z f ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ iː ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m iː ð h ɚ w ɛ n z d eɪ æ t ð ə t ɹ æ n s t eɪ ʃ ə n
